tool_description: Analyzes trending topics and search volumes across different platforms and time periods to identify content opportunities.

keywords.description: List of seed keywords or topics to analyze

platforms.description: Platforms to analyze: google, twitter, youtube, reddit, news

error_messages: Invalid platform: Use combinations of [google, twitter, youtube, reddit, news]
Empty keywords array: Provide at least one keyword to analyze
Keyword limit exceeded: Maximum 20 keywords allowed per analysis
usage: Provide keywords array and timeframe, optionally specify platforms. Returns trending data with search volumes and growth patterns.

trending_topics.description: List of trending topics related to input keywords

search_volumes.description: Monthly search volumes for each trending topic

trend_direction.description: Trend direction for each topic: rising, falling, stable

opportunity_score.description: Content opportunity scores (0-100) for each topic
